title: The Superfans Using Stats To Get To The Bottom Of ‘Serial’ FiveThirtyEight » Features | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: “Serial” is over, but the podcast’s fans aren’t done debating who committed the 1999 murder of Baltimore County high school student Hae Min Lee.
